```{r load-packages}
library(shiny)
```

# Select Input

```{r select-input}
selectInput(
    inputId='SelectSample',
    label='Please select a state',
    choices=list('New York', 'Pennsylvania', 'California', 'Texas', 'Tennessee')
)
```

```{r print-state}
renderText(input$SelectSample)
```

# Other Inputs

```{r other-inputs}
sliderInput(
    inputId='SliderSample',
    label='This is a slider',
    min=0, max=10, value=5
)

checkboxInput(
    inputId='CheckSample',
    label='Check this out'
)

radioButtons(
    inputId='RadioSample',
    label='Choose One',
    choices=list('A', 'B', 'C')
)

dateInput(
    inputId='DateChoice',
    label='Select a date'
)
```

# Text Input

```{r text-inputs}
textInput(
    inputId='TextSample',
    label='Write Something',
    placeholder='Enter words here'
)

textAreaInput(
    inputId='TextAreaSample',
    label='Write a long story'
)

passwordInput(
    inputId='PasswordSample',
    label='Enter the secret'
)
```

```{r show-password}
renderText(input$PasswordSample)
```
